items.title: EcoFlow’s final 72-hour New Year flash sale drops RIVER 2 Pro 160W solar bundle to new $429 low ($430 off), more from $599
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing New Year Sale, EcoFlow has launched the final flash sale that lasts 72 hours and heralds the end of the overall event. We’re seeing some notable inclusions – two of which are at new low prices, like the RIVER 2 Pro that comes with a 160W solar panel and FREE bag for $429 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing (that offers no free bag but you can get a FREE 45W solar panel) by $100. This bundle carries a $1,127 MSRP direct from the brand’s website, but at Amazon it usually starts lower around $859, which has been floating near $500+ with discounts for most of the recent months, save for the one-time fall to a $474 low. The deal here gives you even more savings – $430 off the going rate and $698 off the MSRP – landing it down at the lowest new price we have tracked. Head below to checkout the rest of these flash deals while they’re still around.
